sense.gloss: appetizer or snack served with drinks
performance to liven up a bar, conversation to liven up a party
grilled fish
delicacy, rare treat, good-eating fish
food and (alcoholic) drinks, food eaten with an alcoholic drink, accompaniment to a drink
small fish, fry
raw fish, uncooked fish, fresh fish
rare delicacies, rare treat
fine wines and prized delicacies
cheap wines and unpalatable dishes (a modest (self-deprecating) way of offering a meal to a guest)
delicacies, epicurean dishes
uncommon and delicious meal
vinegared appetizer
side dish served in order to encourage the consumption of alcohol (kaiseki cuisine)
to have as a side order (with drinks)
to make fun of someone, to laugh at someone's expense

k_ele.e: 嘉肴ありと雖も食らわずんばその旨きを知らず

r_ele.r: かこうありといえどもくらわずんばそのうまきをしらず

sense.gloss: one cannot understand even a holy man's teachings without study, one cannot know the abilities of a great man without putting him to use, one cannot know the delicious taste of fine food without eating it
appetizer or snack served with drinks, accompaniment to an (alcoholic) drink
accompaniment to a drink served at celebrations (such as New Year)
low-grade fish, cheap fish

sdata.j: ↑豆腐↑↓とうふ↓は↑良↑↓い↓い↑酒↑↓さけ↓の↑肴↑↓さかな↓になる。
sdata.e: Tofu is a good accompaniment for sake.

sdata.j: ↑豆腐↑↓とうふ↓は↑良↑↓い↓い↑酒↑↓さけ↓の↑肴↑↓さかな↓になる。
sdata.e: Tofu goes well with good sake.
